name: Amalgamage
description: Does the amalgamage know how to turn lead to gold, call lightning from the sky or turn his enemies to stone? No, but he does know how to botch things together until they get way too big to handle. As long as he can keep the heart of his creation, the amalgam, from touching the energy walls that surround his workspace, all is well in amalgamage-land. Which would be easy, if it wasn't for all the stuff flying around his laboratory…
